name: Hand of the Gods Venus Competitor’s Pack
name_original: Hand of the Gods Venus Competitor’s Pack
description:
No matter what Pantheon you want to fight with, it’s important to round out your deck with Neutral cards. In this incredible pack, you’ll get 27 Neutral cards and 10 bonus Core Card Packs! It’s a deck builder’s dream!
Plus: You’ll unlock the Legendary Roman Goddess of Love Venus. And to make the deal even better you’ll unlock the Exclusive Venus Aphrodite Skin in SMITE!
Unleash Your Army
Includes:
2 Copies of these Neutral Common Cards (8 Cards Total)
Accensus
Chaofeng
Departed Warrior
Surtr
2 Copies of these Neutral Rare Cards (12 Cards Total)
Arges
Decrepit Bowman
Gallus
Imperial Archer
Oogway
Hyena
2 Copies of these Neutral Epic Cards (6 Cards Total)
Blademaster
Bull Demon King
Sagittarius
1 Legendary Fire Giant Card
1 Legendary Roman Goddess Venus Card
BONUS PACKS: 10 Core Card Packs (50 Cards Total)
The Limited 1 Icon and Competitor’s Card Back, only available in the Venus Competitor’s Pack
Plus even more bonus content in SMITE:
Get the Exclusive Venus Aphrodite Skin in SMITE!
Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
